participant_2.background:
I am most proud of my ability to take care of myself and Gila, even though I grew up without parents.
I love to see my son's face light up when he sees his new toys in his nursery.
I am grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility.
I am worried about my future after high school, but my pet koi, Spot, always cheers me up.
i love to laugh.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you for asking! And yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival with my band this weekend.
That's awesome! I love music festivals. I'm actually a little bit worried about my future after high school, but my pet koi, Spot, always cheers me up.
I'm sure you'll do great! And Spot sounds like a great friend.
Thanks! I'm grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility.
That's great! My parents weren't around much when I was growing up, so I'm glad I have my cat, Leroy Jenkins, to keep me company.
I'm sorry to hear that. But it sounds like you and Leroy have a great relationship.
We do! He's my best friend.
I'm glad to hear that. And I'm sure you'll do great at the music festival this weekend!
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it!
